input_text:
Job Title: RatingsDirect Software Development Intern

Location: Princeton, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About The Role:

Grade Level (for internal use):

05

The Role: RatingsDirect Software Development Intern

The Team:

The Ratings Direct team is responsible to deliver essential and business critical data with applied intelligence to power the market of the future. This enables our customer to make decisions with conviction.

Responsibilities And Impact:

Design and develop software based on business requirements, workflows and use cases; execute and maintain the test cases and document test results.

 Complete SDLC: architecture, design, development and support of tech solutions Play a key role in the development team to build high-quality, high-performance, scalable code Engineer components, and common services based on standard corporate development models, languages and tools Produce technical design documents and conduct technical walkthroughs Collaborate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders Be part of a culture to continuously improve the technical design and code base Document and demonstrate solutions using technical design docs, diagrams and stubbed code

Our Internship Program: During your summer at S&P Global you'll have the chance to partner with our industry experts, with on-the-job experience focusing on high impact work that allows you to apply and develop your skills. Networking, business insights and tailored learning opportunities all support your growth and development, setting you up for success as you begin your career.

The Summer 2024 Internship Program will provide you with a variety of experiences to help you identify your strengths, develop highly transferable skills, and align you to a successful career path for a bright future at S&P Global.

Duration: June 3rd - August 9th.

Compensation/Benefits Information: (This section is only applicable to US candidates)

S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $25 to $30. Final base salary for this role will be based on the individual’s geographic location, as well as experience level, skill set, training, licenses and certifications.

Qualifications:

What We’re Looking For:

Bachelor's Degree in a technology related field to be completed no later than May 2025 Knowledge in C#, .NET, .NET COREknowledge on Java script and Type ScriptDurandal and knockoutExperience in Database technology, Big Data concepts, PythonExperience with DevOps practices and modern CI/CD deployment models using Jenkins

Right To Work Requirements:

This role is limited to persons with indefinite right to work in the United States.

About S&P Global Market Intelligence

At S&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.

For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence.

What’s In It For You?

Our Purpose:

Progress is not a self-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology–the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.

Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.

Our People:

We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.

From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We’re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.

Our Values:

Integrity, Discovery, Partnership

At S&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.

Benefits: 

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.

Our Benefits Include:

Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.

For more information on benefits by country visit: %0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%202024-02-26T16:09:13.592+00:00%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20<!%5BCDATA%5BChange%20Management%20-%20Principal%20

About%20the%20Role:

Department%20overview:

Change%20Management%20is%20a%20department%20of%20Operational%20Excellence,%20which%20sits%20under%20Operations%20and%20Customer%20Services%20umbrella%20of%20OSTTRA%20(a%20S&P%20Global%20and%20Chicago%20Mercantile%20Exchange%20Group%20JV).%20This%20department%20is%20responsible%20for%20working%20on%20business%20transformation%20projects%20emanating%20from%20Operations%20and%20Customer%20Service%20&%20Success%20team.%20Key%20KPIs%20of%20this%20team%20include%20delivering%20projects%20related%20to%20operations%20efficiency,%20reduced%20C/I%20ratio,%20cost%20saves,%20enhancing%20customer%20experience%20thereby%20increasing%20the%20NPS,%20enhancing%20STP%20in%20the%20post%20trade%20business%20thereby%20going%20towards%20%22low%20touch%22,%20streamlining%20various%20business%20processes%20within%20OSTTRA%20for%20a%20unified%20next%20generation%20operations%20strategy,%20addressing%20risk%20mitigation%20and%20regulatory%20projects%20coming%20from%20financial%20services%20post%20trade%20industry.

The%20day-to-day%20responsibilities%20of%20this%20team%20include%20collaborating%20with%20the%20various%20Operations%20functions%20within%20OSTTRA%20to%20identify%20improvement%20opportunities%20related%20to%20people,%20process%20and%20tools.%20The%20team%20is%C2%A0responsible%20for%20conducting%20business%20process%20analysis,%20identifying%20gaps%20and%20improvements,%20gathering%20requirements%20for%20change,%20researching%20comparative%20solutions,%20performing%20benefits%20assessment%20and%20prioritizing%20delivery%20based%20on%20enhanced%20customer%20experience,%20decreased%20costs%20and%20minimized%20risk.

Operational%20excellence%20/%20business%20transformation%20professionals%20work%20in%20a%20fast-paced%20environment%20where%20the%20main%20objective%20is%20to%20execute%20prioritised%20projects%20of%20Operational%20excellence/%20business%20transformation,%20with%20minimal%20handholding,%20and%20ensure%20realisation%20of%20benefits%20linked%20to%20the%20department%20KPIs%20with%20extreme%20sense%20of%20urgency%20and%20attention%20to%20detail.

Position%20summary:

Seeking%20a%20self-driven%20individual%20with%20strong%20problem-solving%20ability,%20logical%20and%20analytical%20bent%20of%20mind,%20who%20has%20experience%20of%20delivering%20business%20transformation%20projects.%20Candidate%20should%20have%20knowledge%20of%20Investment%20banking,%20financial%20services%20domain%20especially%20in%20the%20post%20trade%20side.%20Awareness%20of%20trade%20life%20cycles%20for%20asset%20classes%20like%20FX%20&%20Securities%20would%20be%20beneficial.

Added%20to%20this,%20knowledge%20and%20working%20experience%20of%20implementing%20Operational%20excellence%20and%20business%20transformation%20principles%20like%20Lean,%20Six%20sigma,%20Kaizen,%20Agile%20etc%20would%20be%20an%20added%20advantage.

Exceptional%20communication%20skills,%20both%20verbal%20and%20written%20are%20a%20must.

The%20successful%20candidate%20will%20be%20part%20of%20the%20Change%20Management%20team%20(which%20is%20part%20of%20Operations%20Excellence)%20managing%20change%20within%20the%20OSTTRA's%20FX%20&%20Securities%20Pillar%20for%20the%20Operations%20teams.

Duties%20&%20accountabilities:

Analyse%20new%20project%20requirements%20with%20product%20and%20business%20analysis%20teamsReview%20business%20requirements,%20functional%20requirements,%20JIRA%20stories%20and%20any%20other%20supporting%20materialsProduce%20project%20assessments%20and%20estimates%20to%20review%20with%20Operations%20ManagementPartner%20with%20Operations%20and%20Application%20Support%20teams%20through%20project%20lifecycleDevelop%20change%20plans%20to%20support%20project%20implementationOversee%20and%20track%20task%20executionDefine%20operational%20processes%20required%20to%20support%20functionality%20both%20pre%20and%20post%20go%20liveCreate%20process%20documentation%20and%20supporting%20material%20as%20required%20Oversee%20and%20track%20task%20executionIdentify%20risks%20and%20produce%20mitigation%20plans%20where%20necessary

Education%20and%20experience

Bachelors/%20Masters%20Degree%20in%20Engineering,%20Science,%20Computers%20or%20Management%20stream10-13%20years%20of%20financial%20services/%20capital%20markets%20experience.%20Experience%20in%20post%20trade%20side%20will%20be%20a%20plusPrior%20Business%20Analysis%20(tech%20or%20business%20side)%20background%20is%20preferredAbility%20to%20partner%20with%20stakeholders%20across%20multiple%20teams%20and%20regionsAbility%20to%20work%20independently%20with%20little%20guidanceStrong%20analytical%20skills%20and%20ability%20to%20think%20laterally%20to%20provide%20innovative%20solutions%20to%20problems,%20understands%20the%20%E2%80%98why%E2%80%99Excellent%20communication%20skills%20with%20the%20ability%20to%20explain%20complex%20issues%20easilyHighly%20organised%20with%20ability%20to%20plan%20and%20oversee%20execution%20of%20tasksProcess%20oriented%20with%20a%20focus%20on%20operational%20efficiencyProduce%20high%20standard%20of%20documentationProficient%20in%20MS%20Office%20applications.%C2%A0%20Experience%20with%20Visio%20a%20plus.A%20positive%20can-do%20attitude%20and%20demonstrates%20a%20flexible%20approach%20when%20projects%20change%20direction%20at%20short%20noticeProactive%20and%20solutions-oriented%20problem%20solverStrong%20Operations%20backgroundKnowledge%20of%20post%20trade%20workflows%20highly%20desired

Commercial%20awareness

Understanding%20of%20Osttra's%20commitment%20to%20providing%20exceptional%20customer%20serviceCustomer%20service%20and%20satisfaction%20are%20key%20priorities%20for%20the%20firm.%20Candidates%20must%20be%20aware%20of%20the%20impact%20of%20their%20actions%20on%20internal%20and%20external%20clientsIdentifies%20opportunities%20to%20drive%20change%20in%20business%20and%20implementation%20processes%20to%20realize%20productivity,%20risk,%20commercial%20and%20time%20to%20market%20opportunities.

Management%20requirements

Experience%20of%20working%20in%20remote%20teams%20is%20preferred

Personal%20impact

Candidate%20must%20be%20client%20focused%20and%20possess%20strong%20problem-solving%20skills%20with%20the%20ability%20to%20learn%20new%20concepts%20and%20applications%20quicklyAbility%20to%20work%20effectively%20in%20a%20very%20fast%20paced%20environmentFlexible%20and%20able%20to%20adapt%20to%20changeSelf-Starter%20who%20can%20work%20independently%20with%20minimal%20supervisionMust%20be%20able%20to%20drive%20consensus%20driven%20change%20across%20a%20global%20organization%20at%20varied%20levels

Communication

Effective%20interpersonal,%20written,%20and%20verbal%20communication%20skills%20requiredAbility%20to%20explain%20complex%20ideas%20in%20a%20simple%20way

Teamwork

Ability%20to%20work%20as%20part%20of%20a%20team%20is%20critical%20to%20success,%20not%20just%20regionally%20but%20with%20global%20team%20members

Company%20overview

OSTTRA,%20a%20S&P%20Global%20and%20Chicago%20Mercantile%20Exchange%20Group%20joint%20venture,%20is%20a%20combination%20of%20four%20businesses%20that%20have%20been%20at%20the%20heart%20of%20post%20trade%20evolution%20and%20innovation%20for%20the%20last%2020+%20years:%C2%A0%20MarkitServ,%20Traiana,%20TriOptima%20and%20Reset.%C2%A0%20These%20businesses%20have%20an%20exemplary%20track%20record%20of%20developing%20and%20supporting%20critical%20market%20infrastructure%20and%20bring%20together%20an%20established%20community%20of%20market%20participants%20comprising%C2%A0all%20trading%20relationships%20and%20paradigms,%20connected%C2%A0using%C2%A0powerful%20integration%20and%20transformation%20capabilities.%20OSTTRA%C2%A0is%20a%20market%20leader%20in%C2%A0derivatives%20post-trade%20processing,%20bringing%20innovation,%20expertise,%20processes,%20and%20networks%20together%20to%20solve%20the%20post-trade%20challenges%20of%20global%20financial%20markets.%20%C2%A0OSTTRA%20operates%20cross-asset%20post-trade%20processing%20networks,%C2%A0providing%C2%A0a%20proven%20suite%20of%20Credit%20Risk,%20Trade%20Workflow%20and%20Optimisation%20services.%C2%A0Together%20these%20solutions%20streamline%20post-trade%20workflows,%20enabling%20firms%20to%20connect%20to%20counterparties%20and%20utilities,%20manage%20credit%20risk,%20reduce%20operational%C2%A0risk%20and%C2%A0optimise%C2%A0processing%C2%A0to%C2%A0drive%20post-trade%20efficiencies.

Our%20company%20brings%20together%20people,%20processes,%20and%20networks%20to%20solve%20the%20markets%E2%80%99%20most%20challenging%20problems.%20Innovating,%20integrating,%20and%20optimising%20the%20post-trade%20workflow%20%E2%80%93%20we%20are%20positively%20shaping%20the%20way%20the%20community%20works%20forever.

About OSTTRA

Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.

OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.

With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.

Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.

Learn more at www.osttra.com.

What’s In It For You?

Our Benefits Include:

Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.

For more information on benefits by country visit: https://www.spglobal.com/en/careers/our-culture/

Equal Opportunity Employer

S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person. 

US Candidates Only:  The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law.
